title: [娱乐][HAYO]CCTV Camera —— CCTV录像机[1.4.7~R1.0]
author: mangiare
txt_content:
本帖最后由 1582952890 于 2017-9-16 13:17 编辑 

 CCTV Camera 





5689.jpg (15 KB, 下载次数: 1)

下载附件

2017-4-19 20:38 上传





CCTV Camera是sayadd制作，为中国的CCTV进行宣传你可以用来监控你的服务器无需前置！只需要一个服务器现在已经更新到2.8版本！这个插件可以制作一个摄像头，然后别人可以看到摄像头的内容有两种相机：分配式相机：可以进行传送，并且传送可以多人360相机：可以进行传送，但只能传送一人





特点.jpg (15.18 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2017-4-19 20:38 上传





无需前置   √可以支持多世界浏览  √可以配置相机的ID以及屏幕的ID  √可以自动检查错误





命令.jpg (14.61 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2017-4-19 20:38 上传





<>代表必填 []代表选填/cctv create camera <录像机名字> 进入相机创建模式（左键合成）~默认合成配方：发射器——海绵——黑曜石/cctv create screen <屏幕名字> 进入屏幕创建模式（右键合成）~默认合成配方：黑色羊毛——灰色羊毛/cctv link [录像机名字] [屏幕名字] 连接录像机以及屏幕/cctv modify [参数] [true|false] 如果录像机未连接，就开启所有人都可以使用/cctv delete link 删除所有连接，你不能删除不是你的





权限.jpg (15.21 KB, 下载次数: 1)

下载附件

2017-4-19 20:38 上传





cctv.create  ——可以创建录像机的权限cctv.use  ——可以使用录像机的权限cctv.admin.spy  ——允许查看所有的录像机，无论是公共还是私有的





更新记录.jpg (17.26 KB, 下载次数: 2)

下载附件

2017-4-19 20:38 上传





Version 2.8
Delete in Links.txt required : Nope. Format is unchanged.

Fixed dispenser camera orientation.
Fixed duplication bug.
Version 2.7
Fixed error creating a screen.
Fixed not being able to view from a screen.
Version 2.6
Fixed all(reported) problems related to public cameras. No one specified that the problem was with public cameras before :3
Version 2.5
Fixed annoying message "[CCTV Camera] Someone broke your camera!"
Fixed error upon /cctv link
Version 2.4
The block under a camera is restored to its previous type after using a camera. (Finally)
Version 2.3
Fixed bug - "when you're done with your setup it still says there is a setup active till you use /reload"
Version 2.2
Fixed bug - Disconnect when in camera causes you to get stuck.
Version 2.1
Fixed bug - "You don't have permission" every time someone rightclicks without cctv.use permission.
Added permission - cctv.admin.spy - Allows admins with this perm to use every camera whether private or public.
Version 2.0
Recoded the entire plugin OOP
FIxed every bug filed in tickets.
Dispensers sometimes do not have a face after teleporting to it. (Bukkit bug)





配置文件.jpg (17.06 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2017-4-19 20:38 上传





[fly]未汉化[/fly]# Camera Config Options
Camera:
    # Which block IDS can be a camera? Separated by "," 
       # 49 = Obsidian, 19 = Sponge, 23 = Dispenser.
  Camera Block IDS: 49,19,23
    # Allow dispenser cameras or only 360 cameras are created?
  Camera can be dispenser: true
#Screen Config Options
Screen:
    # Which block IDS can be a screen? Separated by ",".
      # 35:15 = Black Wool , 35:7 = Grey Wool
  Screen Block IDS: 35:15,35:7
#General Config options
CCTV:
    #Creates either glowstone or glass under a camera
  Create Glowstone under camera: false
    #Self explanatory
  Invisible while viewing camera: true
